channel.title: development setup on N & R
channel.description: Recent content in development setup on N & R

item.title: Manage Multiple GitHub Accounts from a Single Shell
item.description: I have two GitHub accounts; One for work and one for personal projects. In this post, I describe my thought process when I was trying to easily switch between the two on my local computer.

item.title: WSL setup for Windows 10
item.description: Let’s learn how we can automate a WSL/WSL2 environment to be setup exactly the way we want it to be. This way if you break your WSL2 installation you can easily reproduce the exact setup within minutes!
